answer:
There is no maximun time recommended between Pneu-C-13 and Pneumo-P-23. We recommend that you discuss this further with your immunization provider.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no maximun time recommended between Pneu-C-13 and Pneumo-P-23.


## We recommend that you discuss this further with your immunization provider.

Immunization Nurse
question: I understand that you need to wait a minimum of 8 weeks after getting PNEU-C-13 before getting PNEU-P-23. Is there a maximum time between the the 2 shots?
question_variation_0: how long between shots between nebulizers
question_variation_1: what is the maximum time between pneu-c-13 and the 2 shots
question_variation_2: what is the time limit between your neoplasm shot
